content: cute amigurumi baby octopus pattern by a little love everyday this pdf pattern for amigurumi baby octopus is written in us crochet terms and available in english skill level easy/ intermediate the pattern requires basic crochet knowledge you should be familiar with - magic_ring - single_crochet - double_crochet - half_double_crochet - increase - decrease - slip_stitch materials you will need - worsted weight yarn in any two colour of your choice - 3 5 mm crochet hook - polyester stuffing - 8 mm safety eyes - tapestry needle size the finished doll measures around 2 5 inches 6 5 cm tall and 2 3 inches 6 cm wide you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use please note this is an ad-free pdf version with step by step pictures of pattern that can be found for free on my blog to view the free version go to www paintitcolorful blogspot com >> this pattern is for personal use only you are not allowed to share publish resell distribute or rewrite this pattern in any way >> you may sell items made from this pattern but please give me a credit as the designer and include a link to this pattern hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute little octopus as much as i did
